Datanyze - San Mateo, CA - Full time - all positions

Jon from Datanyze here. We just got back from Tahoe for our second team offsite (first one was a beach house in Hawaii) and are totally pumped up for a huge 2015. In 2014, we went from 2 to 18 employees, grew our ARR over 500%, and raised $2M from Google Ventures, Mark Cuban and other amazing investors.

We're looking for hungry, talented people to join our sales, marketing and product teams. For more information on our current open positions, go to datanyze.com/careers or email me directly at jon@datanyze.com anytime!
